alert.note: Alert for Leon; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 11:56PM EDT until August 26 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Wakulla County in Big Bend Florida... South central Leon County in Big Bend Florida... * Until 1230 AM EDT. * At 1155 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tallahassee Community College, moving southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Crawfordville, Lake Bradford, Leon Sinks, Lake Munson, Arran, Hilliardville, Eight Mile Pond, Tully, Smith Creek, Silver Lake Rec Area, Medart, Buckhorn, Bethel, and Tallahassee Regional A/P. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
